sentences.sContent: He steeled himself to keep above the suffocating languor that lapped like a rising tide through all the wells of his being.
sentences.sContent_eng: He steeled himself to keep above the suffocating languor that lapped like a rising tide through all the wells of his being.
sentences.sCn: 令人窒息的疲倦像涨潮一样，从他的身体各处涌来，他还是顽强地打醒精神，不让自己被疲倦淹没。

synos.tran: 疲倦；无精打采；柔情；呆滞

remMethod.val: langu (松弛， 倦怠) + or → 身心疲惫

words.tran: 倦怠的；呆滞的；软弱无力的
疲倦地；不感兴趣地；不活泼地；阴沉地
